alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 8:04PM MST until December 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 14 and 28 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous. Travel may become very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways.
info.instruction: Roads will be snow covered resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination. Consider altering your travel plans. Heavy snowfall and blowing snow is expected to make travel very difficult to impossible.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
